priorVersion.title: CDISC SEND Organ Measurement Test Name Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89976

self.title: CDISC SEND Organ Measurement Test Name Terminology

definition: Terminology for the test names concerned with the measurement of organs.
name: Organ Measurement Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Organ Measurement Test Name Terminology

terms.definition: A numeric comparison of the weight of an organ to body weight.
A numeric comparison of the weight of an organ to the weight of the brain.
A numeric comparison of the weight of an organ to the weight of the heart.
The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity. (NCI)
